sports.title: Troy Deeney rates Chelsea’s Premier League title chances after Club World Cup triumph

sports.summary: 'Singing Diogo Jota tribute at Liverpool friendly was emotional' BBCLiverpool’s moving Diogo Jota homage after Preston win leaves Andy Robertson in tears, chokes up commentators Hindustan TimesArne Slot: Diogo was a champion - we'll always carry him with us Liverpool FCLiverpool and Preston players and fans remember ‘champion’ Diogo Jota The GuardianDiogo Jota: Liverpool pay tribute to forward and his brother Andre Silva in pre-season friendly against Preston Sky Sports

sports.title: UPSET ALERT: Jordy Smith stunned at J-Bay
sports.summary: South Africa’s world No 1 surfer Jordy Smith was eliminated from the Corona Cero Open J-Bay on Sunday in the Round of 16.

sports.title: Francesco Molinari brings experience of successful match vs. Tiger Woods to Europe's Ryder Cup team
sports.summary: Francesco Molinari earned the decisive half point against Tiger Woods the last time Europe won a Ryder Cup in the United States. Now he's back as a vice captain on Luke Donald’s team for September’s event at Bethpage Black in...
